description:
Floatzel is a sea weasel Pok√©mon that has a larger floation sac than Buizel in order to pursue aquatic prey. It uses the sac as a rubber raft when being used to save drowning people.
The gym leader Crasher Wake owns a Floatzel, which he uses in a battle against Ash in DP083, where it is ultimately defeated by Ash`s Buizel.
name: Floazel
